named-query.name: noParam
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM Job o WHERE o.userId = :userId

named-query.name: singleStringParam
named-query.query: SELECT o.id, o.userId, o.service FROM Job o WHERE o.userId = :userId

named-query.name: StringListParam
named-query.query: SELECT o.id, o.userId, o.service FROM Job o WHERE o.userId in (:nq__allUsers__userIds__in)

named-query.name: StringListBooleanParam
named-query.query: SELECT o.id, o.userId, o.service FROM Job o WHERE o.completed = :completeStatus and o.userId in (:nq__allUsers__userIds__in)

named-query.name: StringListBooleanDateParam
named-query.query: SELECT o.id, o.userId, o.service FROM Job o WHERE o.completed = :completeStatus and o.userId in (:nq__allUsers__userIds__in) and :date > o.startTime
